name: Marvel vs. Capcom 2
description:
Rule the arena of the world's two most powerful fighting universes. Marvel vs. Capcom 2 is bar-none, the most insane tag-team fighting game on the planet! An unprecedented 56 playable characters raises the bar on arcade fighting with 3 on 3 tag-team battles, unbelievable control and hyper-fast animation. Pick a fight with your favorite legendary Capcom characters and Super Heroes from the Marvel Universe and watch the super combos fly.

Unprecedented: A Total of 56 Playable Characters!

Assemble your Dream Team for Insane 3 on 3 Tag Team Battles

Various Assist Character Types... Each with a Barrage of Special Attributes!
